message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $18000.  Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $18000 is a bit above my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $13000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product and understand your budget.  I can come down a little to $15000.  This is a significant value for you and a fair price for me.  What do you say?
